SEARCH
Package library.service

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
library.service.BookService
public class BookService extends Object
The BookService class provides business logic for managing books in the library system. It handles operations such as creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting books.

    • getBookByIdForLibrarian

      public BookForLibrarianDto getBookByIdForLibrarian(Integer id)
      Retrieves a book by its id for librarian views.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the book
      Returns:
      the BookForLibrarianDto containing book details
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is no book with this ISBN in database

    • updateBook

      public void updateBook(BookForLibrarianDto dto)
      Updates the information of a book in the database based on the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      dto - the BookForLibrarianDto containing updated book information.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during the update operation, such as validation failure or database constraints.
